about.title: About Us
about.description: E-Voque is a leading provider of professional interpretation services, connecting clients with certified interpreters in over 100 languages.
about.mission: Our mission is to break down language barriers and facilitate clear communication across cultures and languages.

medical.description: Specialized interpreters for healthcare settings, ensuring accurate communication between patients and providers.

legal.description: Certified interpreters for court proceedings, depositions, and legal consultations.

business.title: Business Interpretation
business.description: Professional interpretation for meetings, conferences, and international business negotiations.

emergency.title: Emergency Services
emergency.description: 24/7 on-demand interpretation for urgent situations and emergencies.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Ready to break language barriers? Get in touch with our team.

employeeBenefits.overviewDescription: We provide tailored benefit solutions designed to attract and retain top talent while managing costs effectively.
employeeBenefits.strategicDescription1: In today's competitive marketplace, a comprehensive benefits package is essential for attracting and retaining top talent. E-Voque offers customized employee benefits solutions designed to meet the unique needs of your organization and workforce.
employeeBenefits.strategicDescription2: Our team of benefits experts works closely with you to design, implement, and manage benefit programs that enhance employee satisfaction while controlling costs.

requirements.pageSubtitle: Learn about what it takes to become a part of our global network of professional interpreters and translators.
requirements.overviewTitle: Join Our Elite Team of Interpreters
requirements.overviewDescription: E-Voque is always looking for talented language professionals to join our network. We maintain high standards to ensure quality service for our clients. Review the requirements below to see if you qualify.

languageProficiency.title: Language Proficiency
languageProficiency.description: Fluency in at least two languages is required. You must be able to speak, read, and write with native or near-native proficiency in your working languages.
details: Native or near-native fluency in your primary languages
Strong comprehension of dialects and idioms
Excellent accent and pronunciation
Ability to switch between languages smoothly

education.title: Education & Certification
education.description: Formal education or certification in interpretation/translation is highly preferred, but equivalent experience may be considered.
details: Degree in translation, interpretation, or linguistics (preferred)
Professional certification from recognized bodies
Specialized training in medical, legal, or technical fields
Continuing education in language skills

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: Prior experience in interpretation or translation services is required, with preference given to those with specialized industry experience.
details: Minimum 1-2 years of professional interpretation experience
Experience in over-the-phone or video interpretation
Industry-specific experience (medical, legal, business)
Client-facing communication skills

technical.title: Technical Requirements
technical.description: Our remote interpreters need reliable equipment and a suitable work environment to deliver quality service.
details: Reliable computer with updated operating system
High-speed internet connection (minimum 25 Mbps)
Professional headset with noise-cancellation
Quiet, private workspace free from distractions

availability.title: Availability & Flexibility
availability.description: We serve clients 24/7 and value interpreters who can offer flexible scheduling options.
details: Ability to commit to regular weekly hours
Preference for those available during high-demand times
Reliability in adhering to scheduled shifts
Responsiveness to urgent interpretation needs

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.description: All interpreters must meet specific legal requirements to work with our platform.
details: Legal authorization to work in your country of residence
Ability to pass background checks where required
Willingness to sign confidentiality agreements
Compliance with data protection regulations

submitApplication.title: Submit Your Application
submitApplication.description: Complete our online application form with your personal information, language skills, education, and professional experience.

initialScreening.title: Initial Screening
initialScreening.description: Our recruitment team will review your application and contact you for an initial phone screening if your qualifications match our needs.

languageAssessment.title: Language Assessment
languageAssessment.description: Qualified candidates will complete a comprehensive language assessment to evaluate fluency, accuracy, and interpretation skills.

interview.title: Interview & Background Check
interview.description: Successful candidates will have an interview with our team and complete a background check as required for the position.

onboarding.title: Onboarding & Training
onboarding.description: Once accepted, you'll complete our onboarding process and training to familiarize yourself with our platform and procedures.

requirements.ctaDescription: If you meet our requirements and are passionate about connecting people across languages, we want to hear from you!

apply.pageSubtitle: Apply today to become part of our global network of professional interpreters and translators.
apply.videoDescription: Hear from our interpreters about their experience working with us

compensation.title: Competitive Compensation
compensation.description: Earn top rates based on your skills and experience. We offer some of the most competitive pay in the industry.

health.title: Health & Wellness
health.description: We care about your wellbeing. Take advantage of our health benefits designed for remote professionals.

flexibility.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexibility.description: Work when it suits you. Our platform allows you to set your availability and take control of your work-life balance.

development.title: Professional Development
development.description: Grow your skills and advance your career with our training and certification opportunities.

office.title: Remote Office Access
office.description: Access to our premium coworking space at MatMax Cowork in Miraflores when you want a change of scenery.

apply.formDescription: Complete the form below to apply for a position as an interpreter or translator with E-Voque.

testimonial1.name: Maria Johnson
testimonial1.quote: Working with E-Voque has been transformative for my career. The flexibility allows me to maintain work-life balance while the continuous training keeps me at the top of my field.

testimonial2.name: David Chang
testimonial2.quote: The technology platform is intuitive and reliable, and the support team is always there when I need them. I've been able to grow my skills and income significantly.

testimonial3.name: Sofia Martinez
testimonial3.quote: E-Voque truly values their interpreters. The compensation is excellent, and I appreciate the community of professionals they've built. It's been the best career move for me.

question1.title: What qualifications do I need?
question1.answer: We look for fluency in at least two languages, professional experience in interpretation or translation, and strong communication skills. Specialized knowledge in fields like medical, legal, or technical is a plus.

question2.title: How does the application process work?
question2.answer: After submitting your application, our team will review your qualifications. If selected, you'll be invited for a language assessment and interview. The entire process typically takes 1-2 weeks.

question3.title: Can I work part-time or full-time?
question3.answer: Yes, we offer both part-time and full-time opportunities. Our platform allows you to set your own availability, making it perfect for those seeking flexible work arrangements.

question4.title: What equipment do I need?
question4.answer: You'll need a reliable computer, high-speed internet connection, a quality microphone/headset, and a quiet workspace. For some specialized assignments, additional equipment may be required.

finalCta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
finalCta.description: Submit your application today and join our network of professional interpreters making a difference around the world.
